cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on July 28, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4134, Keeping Girls in School Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 110 (Thursday, June 24, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. LOIS FRANKEL of Florida:
H.R. 4134.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, section 8 of the Constitution of the United
States.
[Page H3134]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute (Amended) by Voice Vote.

title: Keeping Girls in School Act
